question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding CITES?
1) Species may be added to or removed from Appendix I and II, or moved between them, only by the Conference of the Parties.
2) Species may be added to or removed from Appendix III at any time and by any Party unilaterally.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Species may be added to or removed from Appendix I and II, or moved between them, only by the Conference of the Parties. However, species may be added to or removed from Appendix III at any time and by any Party unilaterally.
